mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_admin(username,password,enabled) VALUES(#{username},#{password},#{enabled}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username=#{username},password=#{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_admin SET username=#{username},password=#{password} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT sr.id,sr.desc,sr.name,sa.id a_id,sa.name a_name,sa.path FROM sys_role sr LEFT JOIN sys_role_accesses sra on sr.id=sra.roles_id LEFT JOIN sys_access sa on sra.accesses_id=sa.id WHERE sr.id=#{id}
